function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Differential impact of job retention schemes on immigrant workers, leading to potential overrepresentation in certain sectors.","category":"Lower employment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large declines in employment for both immigrants and native-born individuals in colombia and chile","category":"Lower employment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Immigrants are more affected by economic downturns due to less stable employment conditions and generally lower seniority at work","category":"Lower employment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Immigrants are overrepresented in sectors most affected by the pandemic, such as hospitality and essential health professions","category":"Pandemic impact on markets","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Immigrant employment rates experienced a sharp decline in the early phase of the pandemic, with a disproportionately strong increase in 2021","category":"Pandemic impact on markets","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Imposition of a 25% import tariff may disrupt global trade and supply chains, leading to economic instability and reduced chain disruptions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of diversified supply chains leading to dependency on specific regions or countries","category":"Supply chain disruptions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate stockpiles of essential goods","category":"Supply chain disruptions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High concentration of exports or imports in some industries","category":"Supply chain disruptions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Specific assets and knowledge capital involved in supplier base","category":"Supply chain disruptions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Small open economies relying more on foreign inputs and markets","category":"Resource and capability risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Trade-off between instability","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction in economic activity","category":"Global recession and economic instability","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Domestic shocks account for about half
